title: The RETURN of Intel - AORUS 15P Gaming Laptop
description: Thanks to AORUS for sponsoring this video! Check out the AORUS 15P Laptop on Newegg at   Gigabyte's AORUS 15P gaming laptop features Intel's latest 11th gen mobile processor. Is this Intel's chance to hit back at AMD?  Buy iFixit Pro Tech Tool Kit On Amazon (PAID LINK):  On Walmart (PAID LINK):   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Timestamps:  0:00 - Nice 0:16 - Unboxing 1:06 - Laptop exterior impressions 3:30 - Turning the laptop on 4:31 - Microsoft AI Tuner 5:14 - AORUS cooling 5:30 - Specs! 6:19 - Keyboard impressions 6:53 - Gaming! 8:52 - Processor benchmarking - Cinebench! 9:21 - Webcam 9:49 - Opening up the laptop 11:13 - Sound test 11:49 - Conclusion  GET MERCH:  SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:    LTX EXPO:      AFFILIATES & REFERRALS --------------------------------------------------- Affiliates, Sponsors & Referrals:  Private Internet Access VPN:  Our Official Charging Partner Anker:  MK Keyboards:  Nerd or Die Stream Overlays:  Official Game Store:  Amazon Prime:  Audible Free Trial:  Our Gear on Amazon:    FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  Facebook:     FOLLOW OUR OTHER CHANNELS ---------------------------------------------------   Linus Tech Tips:  TechLinked:  Mac Address:  Techquickie:    LMG Clips:  Channel Super Fun:  Carpool Critics:
